LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN.EARLY_CHECK_IN_N_OUT_DESCRIPTION: Early check-in and Late check-out is only possible when there is no other staying guests
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN.LEAVE_LUGGAGE_FIRST_DESCRIPTION: You may leave your luggage in the house first at 12:30
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN.KEEP_LUGGAGE_ON_CHECK_OUT_DESCRIPTION: You may keep your luggage in one of our vacant houses, if there's any, after check out
